Sql.query: update prn_medicionesraw set ptomedicodi = :ptomedicodi, prnvarcodi = :prnvarcodi, medirawfuente = :medirawfuente, medirawfecha = :medirawfecha, medirawtipomedi = :medirawtipomedi, h1 = :h1, h2 = :h2, h3 = :h3, h4 = :h4, h5 = :h5, h6 = :h6, h7 = :h7, h8 = :h8, h9 = :h9, h10 = :h10, h11 = :h11, h12 = :h12, h13 = :h13, h14 = :h14, h15 = :h15, h16 = :h16, h17 = :h17, h18 = :h18, h19 = :h19, h20 = :h20, h21 = :h21, h22 = :h22, h23 = :h23, h24 = :h24, h25 = :h25, h26 = :h26, h27 = :h27, h28 = :h28, h29 = :h29, h30 = :h30, h31 = :h31, h32 = :h32, h33 = :h33, h34 = :h34, h35 = :h35, h36 = :h36, h37 = :h37, h38 = :h38, h39 = :h39, h40 = :h40, h41 = :h41, h42 = :h42, h43 = :h43, h44 = :h44, h45 = :h45, h46 = :h46, h47 = :h47, h48 = :h48, h49 = :h49, h50 = :h50, h51 = :h51, h52 = :h52, h53 = :h53, h54 = :h54, h55 = :h55, h56 = :h56, h57 = :h57, h58 = :h58, h59 = :h59, h60 = :h60, h61 = :h61, h62 = :h62, h63 = :h63, h64 = :h64, h65 = :h65, h66 = :h66, h67 = :h67, h68 = :h68, h69 = :h69, h70 = :h70, h71 = :h71, h72 = :h72, h73 = :h73, h74 = :h74, h75 = :h75, h76 = :h76, h77 = :h77, h78 = :h78, h79 = :h79, h80 = :h80, h81 = :h81, h82 = :h82, h83 = :h83, h84 = :h84, h85 = :h85, h86 = :h86, h87 = :h87, h88 = :h88, h89 = :h89, h90 = :h90, h91 = :h91, h92 = :h92, h93 = :h93, h94 = :h94, h95 = :h95, h96 = :h96, medirawusumodificacion = :medirawusumodificacion, medirawfecmodificacion = :medirawfecmodificacion where medirawcodi = :medirawcodi

select medirawcodi, ptomedicodi, prnvarcodi, medirawfuente, medirawfecha, medirawtipomedi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96 from prn_medicionesraw

select medirawcodi, ptomedicodi, prnvarcodi, medirawfuente, medirawfecha, medirawtipomedi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96 from prn_medicionesraw where medirawcodi = {0}

select medirawcodi, ptomedicodi, prnvarcodi, medirawfuente, medirawfecha, medirawtipomedi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96 from prn_medicionesraw where ptomedicodi = {0} and medirawfecha = to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and prnvarcodi = {2} and medirawfuente = '{3}' and medirawtipomedi = '{4}'

select {0} Asociacodi, t1.medirawfecha, sum(t1.h1) H1, sum(t1.h2) H2, sum(t1.h3) H3, sum(t1.h4) H4, sum(t1.h5) H5, sum(t1.h6) H6, sum(t1.h7) H7, sum(t1.h8) H8, sum(t1.h9) H9, sum(t1.h10) H10, sum(t1.h11) H11, sum(t1.h12) H12, sum(t1.h13) H13, sum(t1.h14) H14, sum(t1.h15) H15, sum(t1.h16) H16, sum(t1.h17) H17, sum(t1.h18) H18, sum(t1.h19) H19, sum(t1.h20) H20, sum(t1.h21) H21, sum(t1.h22) H22, sum(t1.h23) H23, sum(t1.h24) H24, sum(t1.h25) H25, sum(t1.h26) H26, sum(t1.h27) H27, sum(t1.h28) H28, sum(t1.h29) H29, sum(t1.h30) H30, sum(t1.h31) H31, sum(t1.h32) H32, sum(t1.h33) H33, sum(t1.h34) H34, sum(t1.h35) H35, sum(t1.h36) H36, sum(t1.h37) H37, sum(t1.h38) H38, sum(t1.h39) H39, sum(t1.h40) H40, sum(t1.h41) H41, sum(t1.h42) H42, sum(t1.h43) H43, sum(t1.h44) H44, sum(t1.h45) H45, sum(t1.h46) H46, sum(t1.h47) H47, sum(t1.h48) H48, sum(t1.h49) H49, sum(t1.h50) H50, sum(t1.h51) H51, sum(t1.h52) H52, sum(t1.h53) H53, sum(t1.h54) H54, sum(t1.h55) H55, sum(t1.h56) H56, sum(t1.h57) H57, sum(t1.h58) H58, sum(t1.h59) H59, sum(t1.h60) H60, sum(t1.h61) H61, sum(t1.h62) H62, sum(t1.h63) H63, sum(t1.h64) H64, sum(t1.h65) H65, sum(t1.h66) H66, sum(t1.h67) H67, sum(t1.h68) H68, sum(t1.h69) H69, sum(t1.h70) H70, sum(t1.h71) H71, sum(t1.h72) H72, sum(t1.h73) H73, sum(t1.h74) H74, sum(t1.h75) H75, sum(t1.h76) H76, sum(t1.h77) H77, sum(t1.h78) H78, sum(t1.h79) H79, sum(t1.h80) H80, sum(t1.h81) H81, sum(t1.h82) H82, sum(t1.h83) H83, sum(t1.h84) H84, sum(t1.h85) H85, sum(t1.h86) H86, sum(t1.h87) H87, sum(t1.h88) H88, sum(t1.h89) H89, sum(t1.h90) H90, sum(t1.h91) H91, sum(t1.h92) H92, sum(t1.h93) H93, sum(t1.h94) H94, sum(t1.h95) H95, sum(t1.h96) H96 from prn_medicionesraw t1 Join prn_asociaciondetalle t2 on t1.Ptomedicodi = t2.Ptomedicodi where t2.asociacodi = {0} and t1.medirawfecha = to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and prnvarcodi = {2} and medirawfuente = '{3}' and medirawtipomedi = '{4}' group by t1.medirawfecha

select medirawcodi, ptomedicodi, prnvarcodi, medirawfuente, medirawfecha, medirawtipomedi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96 from prn_medicionesraw where ptomedicodi = {0} and medirawfecha between to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and prnvarcodi = {3} and medirawfuente = '{4}' and medirawtipomedi = '{5}'

select {0} Asociacodi, t1.medirawfecha, sum(t1.h1) H1, sum(t1.h2) H2, sum(t1.h3) H3, sum(t1.h4) H4, sum(t1.h5) H5, sum(t1.h6) H6, sum(t1.h7) H7, sum(t1.h8) H8, sum(t1.h9) H9, sum(t1.h10) H10, sum(t1.h11) H11, sum(t1.h12) H12, sum(t1.h13) H13, sum(t1.h14) H14, sum(t1.h15) H15, sum(t1.h16) H16, sum(t1.h17) H17, sum(t1.h18) H18, sum(t1.h19) H19, sum(t1.h20) H20, sum(t1.h21) H21, sum(t1.h22) H22, sum(t1.h23) H23, sum(t1.h24) H24, sum(t1.h25) H25, sum(t1.h26) H26, sum(t1.h27) H27, sum(t1.h28) H28, sum(t1.h29) H29, sum(t1.h30) H30, sum(t1.h31) H31, sum(t1.h32) H32, sum(t1.h33) H33, sum(t1.h34) H34, sum(t1.h35) H35, sum(t1.h36) H36, sum(t1.h37) H37, sum(t1.h38) H38, sum(t1.h39) H39, sum(t1.h40) H40, sum(t1.h41) H41, sum(t1.h42) H42, sum(t1.h43) H43, sum(t1.h44) H44, sum(t1.h45) H45, sum(t1.h46) H46, sum(t1.h47) H47, sum(t1.h48) H48, sum(t1.h49) H49, sum(t1.h50) H50, sum(t1.h51) H51, sum(t1.h52) H52, sum(t1.h53) H53, sum(t1.h54) H54, sum(t1.h55) H55, sum(t1.h56) H56, sum(t1.h57) H57, sum(t1.h58) H58, sum(t1.h59) H59, sum(t1.h60) H60, sum(t1.h61) H61, sum(t1.h62) H62, sum(t1.h63) H63, sum(t1.h64) H64, sum(t1.h65) H65, sum(t1.h66) H66, sum(t1.h67) H67, sum(t1.h68) H68, sum(t1.h69) H69, sum(t1.h70) H70, sum(t1.h71) H71, sum(t1.h72) H72, sum(t1.h73) H73, sum(t1.h74) H74, sum(t1.h75) H75, sum(t1.h76) H76, sum(t1.h77) H77, sum(t1.h78) H78, sum(t1.h79) H79, sum(t1.h80) H80, sum(t1.h81) H81, sum(t1.h82) H82, sum(t1.h83) H83, sum(t1.h84) H84, sum(t1.h85) H85, sum(t1.h86) H86, sum(t1.h87) H87, sum(t1.h88) H88, sum(t1.h89) H89, sum(t1.h90) H90, sum(t1.h91) H91, sum(t1.h92) H92, sum(t1.h93) H93, sum(t1.h94) H94, sum(t1.h95) H95, sum(t1.h96) H96 from prn_medicionesraw t1 Join prn_asociaciondetalle t2 on t1.Ptomedicodi = t2.Ptomedicodi where t2.asociacodi = {0} and t1.medirawfecha between to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and prnvarcodi = {3} and medirawfuente = '{4}' and medirawtipomedi = '{5}' group by t1.medirawfecha

select medirawcodi, ptomedicodi, prnvarcodi, medirawfuente, medirawfecha, medirawtipomedi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96, medirawusucreacion, medirawfeccreacion, medirawusumodificacion, medirawfecmodificacion from prn_medicionesraw where ptomedicodi = {0} and prnvarcodi = {1} and medirawfuente = '{2}' and medirawfecha = to_date('{3}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and medirawtipomedi = '{4}'
